name: Ant Simulator 3D
summary: In Ant Simulator 3D you can expire adventures from the perspective of a tiny ant. This 3D survival game and animal simulator will set you into a realistic simulation of the insect world. Establish your own Ant Colony. Search for food resources in order to feed the ant queen and the larvae. Explore a large and detailed ant habitat populated with other insects which will attack your ant colony. After the required amount of food the ant queen will lay eggs that evolve to larvae.
